title: Homemade Egg Noodles
directions: In the bowl of a food processor fitted with a metal blade, add all of the ingredients. Turn the food processor on an process until the dough forms into a ball. If the ball does not form, add more milk 1 teaspoon at a time. Remove from food processor and wrap in plastic wrap. Allow dough to rest to at least 15 minutes. Roll out the dough on a flour surface and cut into strips. Or roll through a pasta machine and cut into strips.
